company_updates_collection.description:
We’re looking forwards to meeting everyone at GESS Dubai and telling you all about Phonics Shed, Spelling Shed and MathShed. 

If you are an existing customer, come and say hello at stand P44, and we can give you an account review to help you get the most out of our system. #dubai #edshed #teaching #gessdubai #spelling #phonics #maths
We’re all ready at Schoolscape in Stellenbosch. Come and talk to us to learn more about our products for primary English and Maths.

🤩FREE Interactive Letter Tiles Tool 🥳

https://lnkd.in/eW6bPJmv

FREE for non-subscribers and EdShed subscribers

👉 Shows graphemes and single letters
👉 Displays phonics notation
👉 Reads words aloud
👉 Tiles can be hidden
👉 Shows definition
👉 Shows word classes / part of speech
👉 Has a useful drawing tool
👉 Includes uppercase and lowercase letters

Hey #ISTELive22 - Yep we got them! 

Come by booth #2345 and get your beads on.

#neworleans #istelive #edtech #mardigras

We can’t wait to see you at #istelive! Come and visit us next week at booth #2345. 

#scienceofreading #spelling #phonics #teaching #neworleans

We're proud to be finalists in the Centuro Global Int-X awards for "Best Global Expansion"! 

We are a nearly five years old, self-funded EdTech startup that has reached nearly 20M users in over 150 countries. Vote for us at https://lnkd.in/eQB28YVC 🙏 #edtech #awards #global #intx

For US school, we’re offering a FREE summer school phonics / science of reading program. 

This will start with a FREE 90 minute PD webinar, the first of which is on 5/18 at 7pm EST. Content will include:

📚The research behind Science of Reading
📚What is meant by, “Systematic, explicit phonics teaching”
📚What good quality phonics teaching looks like in the classroom
📚The relationship between phonics and spelling
📚How stories can help children learn 
📚How to assess your students and identify gaps in their knowledge

Our program materials then include:

🧑🏫Full lesson plans for our narrative driven, multi-sensory phonics program
🧑🏫Songs, actions and stories
🧑🏫Diagnostic assessments
🧑🏫Digital flashcards, E-books and phonics games
🧑🏫Online screening tools

For more information or to register for a webinar visit https://lnkd.in/eHj7MGNq #scienceofreading #sor #phonics #school #k12 #ela #reading #literacy
We’re delighted to be able to say that Phonics Shed is now a DfE approved phonics teaching programme!

We are hiring! 

We’re currently have three posts open:

1) Customer support advisor (Full time, Worcestershire HQ)
2) Finance assistant (Part time, term time, Worcestershire HQ)
3) Marketing executive - Must have teaching experience (Full time, Remote / UK)

Follow the link 👇 for more information or to apply. 

https://lnkd.in/eMsaK2Sz

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Is spelling important?

We tackle this issue on a new bonus episode of the Easy EdTech Podcast.

Use the link below to listen on the web (press play right on my website), or search for it in your favorite podcast app.

I'm very excited to partner with EdShed for this episode and insightful conversation. You'll learn a lot (I know I did) from Martin Saunders and Maggie Moosvi.

https://lnkd.in/e-XMWUKE

#edtech #spelling #literacy #classtechtips

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Phonics Shed Education Ambassador for the Middle East and North Africa (MENA)
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
What a fantastic opportunity to meet all those wonderful people, leaders, teachers and teaching assistants at the school and nursery show in Abu-Dhabi. Our  Phonics Shed programme, a unique multi-sensory and narrative-driven learning programme, is the first scheme in the MENA region with on-the-ground training included in our packages. If you need more information about Phonics Shed ps DM or email me at fatima@edshed.com. I will do free school demos for Abu-Dhabi schools of our phonics shed scheme. If you’re interested, please message me. 

Our Uk team of phonics shed are looking forward to working with all the UAE schools in raising awareness and reaching out on the importance of using phonics as a tool for learning for our children to develop their reading, writing and speaking skills. I look forward to a fantastic learning journey. 
 #teachertraining  #schoolleaders  #teaching #schoolstaff  #experience #people #leaders #email #learning #teachers #schools #uae #writing  #team #opportunity #training

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Hi everyone. Last chance to register for the phonics workshop. 

In my upcoming workshop, I will introduce awareness of the importance of teaching phonics in the early years and primary education through storytelling and multi-sensory learning using the phonics shed scheme Synthetic systematic phonics programme (SSP). Phonics Shed is a multi-sensory and narrative-driven phonics programme validated and approved scheme by the Uk Department of Education. 

It's my pleasure to announce I will be conducting a workshop on phonics with Early Childhood Development Forum. This workshop is for head teachers, leaders, teachers, teaching assistants and parents. Everyone will receive a certificate upon completion of the course. Also, you will get some free takeaways for all participants from our phonics shed team in the Uk. 

For more information on the course, please DM or email me at fatima@edshed.com, and I will provide all the information you need! 

Phonics#teachers #team #development #email #education#Phonics Shed

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
What a fantastic opportunity to meet all those wonderful people, leaders, teachers and teaching assistants at the school and nursery show in Abu-Dhabi. Our  Phonics Shed programme, a unique multi-sensory and narrative-driven learning programme, is the first scheme in the MENA region with on-the-ground training included in our packages. If you need more information about Phonics Shed ps DM or email me at fatima@edshed.com. I will do free school demos for Abu-Dhabi schools of our phonics shed scheme. If you’re interested, please message me. 

Our Uk team of phonics shed are looking forward to working with all the UAE schools in raising awareness and reaching out on the importance of using phonics as a tool for learning for our children to develop their reading, writing and speaking skills. I look forward to a fantastic learning journey.

Does your Systematic Synthetic Phonics scheme meet the National Curriculum statutory requirements for KS1? Does it prepare your children for the more complex code they will encounter in their reading and writing in Year 3 and beyond?

The simple answer is that almost all Government Validated Phonics Schemes do not adequately cover the National Curriculum objectives.

We have found that objectives like those listed below are often omitted from phonics schemes. 

-tch – This sound is usually spelled as ‘tch’ if it comes straight after a single vowel letter. 
The /v/ sound at the end of words. 
Adding -s and -es to words.
Adding the endings -ing, -ed and -er to verbs where no change is needed to the root word. 
The prefix un-.

These objectives need to be covered in order to meet National Curriculum requirements. Due to this, we advise that a spelling programme be used alongside your phonics programme.

Another reason for teaching spelling alongside phonics is that it allows children to draw upon a range of skills to spell words effectively. 

All National Curriculum Objectives are explicitly taught through the Spelling Shed programme. 

We suggest that schools begin using Spelling Shed alongside your chosen phonics scheme in years 1 and 2.

I read articles about children learning to read in some schools. It’s a ‘phonics first’ or ‘phonics only’ approach and children are only ‘allowed’ to read books from a certain scheme or that they’re only ‘allowed’ to take decodable books home and teachers only read books from the scheme due to ‘fidelity.’  

I think to myself, ‘why are they saying this no one teaches this way’ and then teachers tell me, ‘this is the way my school makes me do it!’ 

If a phonics scheme tells you that only their books should be read, by, to or with children then they’re probably just trying to sell you more books. 

Yes, children’s reading instruction should be based on books that they can decode but they can also explore awesome non-fiction, read picture books,  have wondrous stories read to them and learn to love literature!   Reading should be magical and should not be all about ‘Pat’s Nits’ or ‘snip nod pan.’

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
October is ADHD Awareness Month! It is a global initiative dedicated to raising awareness about Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD). This neurodevelopmental condition affects millions of people worldwide, impacting their daily lives in various ways.

The theme "Awareness is Key" underscores the critical importance of understanding ADHD. By increasing awareness, we can:

🧠 Reduce stigma: Challenge negative stereotypes and misconceptions about ADHD, fostering a more accepting and inclusive environment.
🧠 Improve diagnosis: Early and accurate diagnosis can lead to appropriate interventions and support, improving quality of life.
🧠 Enhance treatment: Greater awareness can drive research and development of effective treatments and accommodations.
🧠 Foster understanding: Promote empathy and understanding among individuals, families, and communities.

Join us at the Global ADHD Conference 2024 this October 3-4! This virtual event aims to raise awareness, acceptance, and support for individuals with ADHD. Learn from experts and connect with a community of like-minded individuals from around the world. Let's raise ADHD understanding individually, locally, nationally, and globally.

Register here for FREE: https://lnkd.in/exRNVPAF

#GlobalADHDConference2024 #ADHDAwarenessMonth #ADHD #ADHDUK

🐝🤩 Yesterday you might have spotted Spelling Shed in the top 3 paid iPad apps on the App Store. 

Spelling Shed is the #1 best-selling spelling app in the UK. If you've not tried it yet, you can head to the app store now and discover fun, engaging games used by millions of pupils worldwide.

With phonics and spelling serving as fundamental building blocks in education📚, we’re truly excited to announce EdShed as our event sponsor for 2025.
EdShed’s innovative literacy solutions make them an ideal partner in supporting our mission to move
education forward.

To explore more about their offerings, visit their website: www.edshed.co.za 

🗓️ Schoolscape ONE Dates: 
27 Feb - CPT, 6 March - JHB, 13 March - KZN

EdShed Phonics and Spelling provides classroom teaching resources and an online spelling and assessment platform for Grades R-6, perfectly aligned to the CAPS curriculum 📚 .

For Grades R-2, EdShed Phonics and Spelling provides a multi-sensory, systematic progression through synthetic phonics. This includes a full teaching and assessment toolkit, with daily lesson plans, resources, and digital phonics games for both school and home 🗒️ .

In Grade 3 and beyond, the focus shifts to spelling with an evidence-based curriculum, supported by interactive Spelling Shed games and data tools. Lessons are fully planned and fully resourced and incorporate phonics, morphology, etymology and activities that support orthographic mapping.
EdShed’s approach makes learning to read, write and spell fun and effective for both teachers and learners alike.

Learn more at www.edshed.co.za

🗓️ Schoolscape ONE Dates: 
27 Feb - CPT, 6 March - JHB, 13 March - KZN

My co-founder at EdShed  Martin Saunders    cementing our philosophy here.  We’re unapologetic of the fact we put learning front and centre.  We don’t say ‘do some boring learning so you can get to play a fun game to make up for it afterwards’. We say, ‘this is learning and it is fun’!
